name: Samurai SaGa (Samuraisaga)
description:
A samurai went to war. After returning from the battle, he returned to his village, but on the way he found all the strange things, and he reached his village. It was found that none of them were found, but the soldier's body was found. His village is full of demons. This man must come back to help him village.

Control 

WASD - Moving 

Shirt -Run 

Left click mouse - Fight
